Package networking

This package is used for the lowest layer of communication between nodes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataPacket  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BigPacket
    This class is a viritual DataPacket.
    MultiMonitor
    MultiMonitor is a thread that monitors a MulticastSocket for data received.
    Networker
    This class when instantiated handles the SKCP layer.
    Sequencer  
    SmallPacket
    This class will form objects that form packets to be sent over UDP.
    Test
    This class will test the functionality of all classes within the package networking
    UniMonitor
    UniMonitor is a thread that monitors a DatagramSocket for data received.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BigPacketSentException
    DatagramDataSizeException is thrown when a BigPacket is offered to be sent.
    DatagramDataSizeException
    DatagramDataSizeException is thrown when a DataPacket is instantiated with a byte array exceeding the maximum size.

Package networking Description

This package is used for the lowest layer of communication between nodes. The layer shall be named after its inventor. Therefor the abbreviation SKCP will stand for Sander Koning Connection Protocol.
Since:
2014-04-08
Version:
0.1
Author:
Sander Koning
